data.title: Company Profile Website
data.description: Company profile for PT. Artha Permata Makmur. This project build has several features. This project just show frontend, and the backend in another private repo with realtime get data.

data.title: Kamar Pelajar
data.description: This is my project as Freelance Frontend Developer in Kamar Pelajar. I have responsibility to redesign and slicing user interface using laravel blade.

data.title: Slicing BuiltWithAngga Challenge
data.description: Participate challenge to slicing website that held by BuiltWithAngga.

data.title: Cinema Booking Compfest Challenge
data.description: Sea Cinema is a movie ticket booking application that allows users to browse and book movie tickets conveniently. With its intuitive interface and seamless functionality, Sea Cinema provides a hassle-free movie ticket booking experience.

data.title: Website Second Hand - Binar Academy
data.description: The Second Hand website is a website for buying and selling used goods as a final assignment for the Fullstack Web Development activity at Binar Academy, an independent study program at Merdeka Campus 2022. This activity was carried out online for 6 months from February 2022 to April 2022. In this final assignment, the mentor randomly divide each group member into 2 divisions, namely frontend and backend. And in this group, I was given the task of being in the frontend division with the task of creating the appearance of the website with the bootstrap framework and carrying out API integration.
